pages.text: Spruce logs can be drained to collect spruce sap, which can be used in making amber, a new material that will allow you to make a pickaxe strong enough to mine tungsten.
Item drains can be used to drain fluid out of certain items.
Spouts are used to fill items with liquids, the counterpart to item drains
Fluid tanks contain fluids, perfect for storing excess for later.

pages.title: Amber Clump
pages.text: Spruce sap can be obtained by draining spruce logs. $(br) Compacting spruce sap in a basin with a mechanical press will yield Amber clumps.
Now you can use amber clumps to make a new tool. $(br)Amber pickaxes can mine tungsten; a strong metal.
